data.title: Nameless Places
data.meta_description: Sauk City: Arkham House, 1975. First Edition. Signed by contributor and editor Gerald W. Page, with an inscription, on the title page. Also signed by jacket artist, Tim Kirk, and with an original drawing by, Tim Kirk, on the title page. In original, unclipped 7.50 , jacket in protective sheet. Very light rubbing to front corners, otherwise very fine. Bound in black cloth over boards with gilded lettering on the spine.
data.text:
Sauk City: Arkham House, 1975. First Edition. Signed by contributor and editor Gerald W. Page, with an inscription, on the title page. Also signed by jacket artist, Tim Kirk, and with an original drawing by, Tim Kirk, on the title page. In original, unclipped ($7.50), jacket in protective sheet. Very light rubbing to front corners, otherwise very fine. Bound in black cloth over boards with gilded lettering on the spine. Solid, square, and very tightly bound. The interior is clean, clear, and crisp. A one-of-a-kind copy of this collection twenty-seven original stories with unique signatures.

Pages: (8) 279 Dimensions: 8¼ x 5½ x 1. Fine / Fine. Item #5244
